title: Nik Software Photoshop Plugins Complete Collection MacOSX (2013)
description:
The Complete Collection Ultimate Edition includes support for every plug-in to work in Photoshop, Elements, Lightroom, and Aperture. The Complete Collection for Lightroom contains all six Nik Software products but works only within Lightroom and Aperture.

The Complete Collection contains:

Dfine 2.0 - Best-in-class noise reduction to improve the quality of virtually every photo.

Viveza 2 - Powered by U PointÃ‚Â® technology, Viveza 2 is the most powerful and precise tool available to globally or selectively control light and color in photographs without the need to create complicated selections or layer masks.

HDR Efex Pro 2 - Powerful controls for creating exceptional natural and artistic images.

Color Efex Pro 4 Complete Edition - The photographer's choice for photographic filters.

Silver Efex Pro 2 - The world's leading black and white imaging software.

Sharpener Pro 3.0 - The most advanced, powerful, and complete sharpening solution for photographers.

Color Efex Pro 4005
Dfine 2.112

Sharpener Pro 3.010
